name: snake-it!
description:
snake-it!

how to play(important):

  • best played out of fullscreen
  • move your mouse, and the snake will follow
  • collect as many crystals as possible(can you reach 300?)
  • make sure the red snakes don't touch your snake's head, or you'll lose 5 seconds!
  • good luck, and enjoy!

changelog:

  • fixed a bug that made the music stop playing
  • tried to fix some fullscreen webgl issues
  • fixed colors
  • fixed retry button not working in fullscreen(there are still issues)
